<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <StiSerializer version="1.02" type="Net" application="StiReport"> <BeginRenderEvent>varDTIni = new DateTime(PDTINI.Year, PDTINI.Month, PDTINI.Day); varDTFim = new DateTime(PDTFIM.Year, PDTFIM.Month, PDTFIM.Day, 23, 59, 59).AddDays(-1);
dsGeral010.Connect();
string vLocalReportName = Replace(Substring(ReportName,0,(int)Length(ReportName)-12), " ", ""); vGlobalReportName = vLocalReportName;
dsRelatorio.Connect();
dsLogo.Connect();
dsUser.Connect(); </BeginRenderEvent> <Dictionary Ref="1" type="Dictionary" isKey="true"> <BusinessObjects isList="true" count="0" /> <Databases isList="true" count="1"> <primeWARE Ref="2" type="Stimulsoft.Report.Dictionary.StiSqlDatabase" isKey="true"> <Alias>primeWARE</Alias> <ConnectionStringEncrypted>9Gz3SF5MAaRqRv3cSwGlJ9FY3YhFGLu87EfonWQR4/eDaJHrZ10ZmUJbrNnqhGI/2e7RK0VZUaTMbdDM4QHjTsJw9aFPahnxRUS13GNFaV6T8mOjZ0tDbUUVoK1JbKRqlFLJwtVM+w==</ConnectionStringEncrypted> <Name>primeWARE</Name> </primeWARE> </Databases> <DataSources isList="true" count="4"> <dsGeral010 Ref="3" type="Stimulsoft.Report.Dictionary.StiSqlSource" isKey="true"> <Alias>dsGeral010</Alias> <Columns isList="true" count="11"> <value>flag,System.Int32</value> <value>DataNascimento,System.DateTime</value> <value>Nome,System.String</value> <value>IdadeAtual,System.Int32</value> <value>UltimaCompra,System.String</value> <value>Telefones,System.String</value> <value>Cidade_Estado,System.String</value> <value>MesDescricao,System.String</value> <value>MesNumero,System.Int32</value> <value>mes,System.Int32</value> <value>dia,System.Int32</value> </Columns> <CommandTimeout>30</CommandTimeout> <ConnectOnStart>False</ConnectOnStart> <Dictionary isRef="1" /> <Name>dsGeral010</Name> <NameInSource>primeWARE</NameInSource> <Parameters isList="true" count="2"> <value>_x0040_pDTIni,varDTIni,4,0</value> <value>_x0040_pDTFIm,varDTFim,4,0</value> </Parameters> <SqlCommand>set dateformat ymd;
with datas as ( select DATEPART(MONTH, dt.data) mes, DATEPART(DAY, dt.data) dia FROM PegaTabelaDeDatas (@pDTIni, @pDTFim) dt ), PessoaFisicaTMP as ( select dt.mes, dt.dia, pf.ECO_ID PessoFisicaID from datas dt inner join PessoaFisica pf on dt.mes = DATEPART(MONTH, pf.DataNascimento) and dt.dia = DATEPART(DAY, pf.DataNascimento) ) select 1 flag , pf.DataNascimento , pers.Nome , pfTMP.mes , pfTMP.dia , DATEDIFF(YEAR, pf.DataNascimento, GETDATE()) IdadeAtual , ( select top 1 rtrim(CONVERT(char, cmePV.DataEmissao, 103)) + ' - ' + cmenPV.Numero from TipoMovimentoEstoque tmePV inner join CabecalhoMovimentoEstoque cmePV on tmePV.ECO_ID = cmePV.TipoMovimentoEstoque inner join CabMovEstoqueNumero cmenPV on cmePV.NumeroPadrao = cmenPV.ECO_ID where tmePV.Abreviacao = 'PDV' and pf.ECO_ID = cmePV.Personalidade order by cmePV.DataEmissao desc ) UltimaCompra , replace( rtrim( coalesce( ( select fone.Numero + ' ' from Endereco ender inner join Telefone fone on ender.ECO_ID = fone.Endereco where ender.Personalidade = pers.ECO_ID and fone.Numero <> '' order by fone.Numero for xml path(''), type).value('.[1]','varchar(max)') , '') ) , ' ', ', ') Telefones , replace( rtrim( coalesce( ( select cd.Nome + '/' + cd.UF + ' - ' + ender.EMail + ' ' from Endereco ender inner join Bairro br on ender.Bairro = br.ECO_ID inner join Cidade cd on br.Cidade = cd.ECO_ID inner join Telefone fone on ender.ECO_ID = fone.Endereco where ender.Personalidade = pers.ECO_ID and fone.Numero <> '' group by cd.Nome + '/' + cd.UF + ' - ' + ender.EMail + ' ' order by 1 for xml path(''), type).value('.[1]','varchar(max)') , '') ) , ' ', ', ') Cidade_Estado , case pfTMP.mes when 01 then 'Janeiro' when 02 then 'Fevereiro' when 03 then 'Mar√ßo' when 04 then 'Abril' when 05 then 'Maio' when 06 then 'Junho' when 07 then 'Julho' when 08 then 'Agosto' when 09 then 'Setembro' when 10 then 'Outubro' when 11 then 'Novembro' when 12 then 'Dezembro' else 'x' end MesDescricao , pfTMP.mes MesNumero , pfTMP.Dia MesNumero from PessoaFisicaTMP pfTMP inner join PessoaFisica pf on pfTMP.PessoFisicaID = pf.ECO_ID inner join Personalidade pers on pf.ECO_ID = pers.ECO_ID order by pfTMP.mes, pfTMP.dia, 3, 2 </SqlCommand> </dsGeral010> <dsRelatorio Ref="4" type="Stimulsoft.Report.Dictionary.StiSqlSource" isKey="true"> <Alias>dsRelatorio</Alias> <Columns isList="true" count="1">
